Name: Balls and Dungeons
About the game: Challenging spatial puzzle platformer. Lead the balls through the dungeons, going deeper and deeper. When the ball is on the platform, walls with the same color as platform are opened and the ball can pass by. Put all balls in the holes to complete level! How deep can you get? Balls and Dungeons puzzle platformer is: - Good brain teasing game to test and develop your spatial skills. - Lots of levels with increasing complexity. More colors, more balls and bigger dungeons! - Requires logic and tactics to complete. - High levels require good strategic skills and planning. - Relaxing and ambient gameplay. - You can restart level anytime you want. - When the level is completed, the progress is saved, so next time you can continue!
